detailsSection:
This eBook provides an overview of Microsoft SharePoint and OneDrive for Business security and compliance capabilities designed to address the modern workstyle.

There’s a in shift in work habits: more employees are working remotely and using mobile devices to perform business tasks. 

To enable the productivity of these remote workers, organizations are embracing cloudbased collaboration solutions and mobile devices to ensure that almost any office job can be done remotely. While enabling remote working capabilities, organizations are also concerned about the security of their sensitive business data, which could potentially get exposed in this new world of work. The risk of information exposure has increased because users don’t always work from endpoints connected to the corporate network, and sensitive data is no longer restricted to the organizational perimeter. Organizations with enormous security budgets and elite security analysts are still struggling to address the increased threats of this modern workstyle. 

This eBook provides an overview of Microsoft SharePoint and OneDrive for Business security and compliance capabilities designed to address the modern workstyle.
